content:
# The inventory check confirms that I do not currently have a stone furnace available. This means I need to create one before I can proceed with smelting the iron ore.

# Since I have the necessary resources (coal and iron ore), I will craft a stone furnace using the available materials.

craft_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, quantity=1)  # Crafting one stone furnace. 
print(f"Crafted stone furnace. Current inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after crafting.
